title: Add Patient to Disease Registry
description: A patient is newly diagnosed with diabetes. The system needs to automatically add them to the diabetes disease registry.

tasks.description: A provider adds a new diagnosis of 'Type 2 Diabetes' to a patient's problem list.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new diagnosis is saved in the EHR.

tasks.description: A system rule automatically detects the new diagnosis.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system's logic is triggered by the new data.

tasks.description: The system automatically adds the patient to the 'Diabetes' disease registry for population health management.
tasks.expected_outcome: The patient is now included in all diabetes-related quality reporting and outreach campaigns.
